MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW8 postcode area of Northwich. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:54am. Our engineers have arrived at Ridding Lane and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:47am on 6th March
